biotools.summary: dnaMATE calculates a consensus melting temperature (Tm) for any given short DNA sequence (16-30 nts) based on three independent thermodynamic data tables.   Stand-alone version available, list of other melting temperature calculation servers also provided.

bioschemas.name: dnaMATE
bioschemas.summary: dnaMATE calculates a consensus melting temperature (Tm) for any given short DNA sequence (16-30 nts) based on three independent thermodynamic data tables.   Stand-alone version available, list of other melting temperature calculation servers also provided.
